verbose_text: Our strategy of pharmacological inhibition of ECE1 by phosphoramidon was expected to reduce the generation of mature endothelin peptides in the chick embryo, and consequently silence both EDNRA and EDNRB, which are required to build a normal craniofacial skeleton and establish a complete enteric nervous system, respectively.
evidence: ECE1 by phosphoramidon was expected to reduce the generation of mature endothelin
